description: Transform single-tenant Dog Walker API into white-label multi-tenant SaaS with Admin Dashboard, Customer Web UI, and iOS app

userStories.title: Create organizations table migration
userStories.description: As a platform admin, I need an organizations table to store tenant information.
acceptanceCriteria: Create migration file for organizations table with: id (UUID PK), name (VARCHAR), slug (VARCHAR UNIQUE), subdomain (VARCHAR), custom_domain (VARCHAR nullable), created_at, updated_at
Add index on slug column for fast lookups

userStories.title: Create organization_settings table migration
userStories.description: As a platform admin, I need to store tenant settings including branding configuration.
acceptanceCriteria: Create migration for organization_settings table with: id (UUID PK), organization_id (FK), branding (JSONB), feature_flags (JSONB), subscription_tier (VARCHAR), created_at, updated_at
Add foreign key constraint to organizations table

userStories.title: Create tenant_databases table in master DB
userStories.description: As a platform admin, I need to track database connection info for each tenant.
acceptanceCriteria: Create migration for tenant_databases table with: id (UUID PK), organization_id (FK), connection_string (VARCHAR encrypted), status (VARCHAR: active/inactive/provisioning), created_at, updated_at

userStories.title: Create platform_admins table
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a separate table for platform-level admin users.
acceptanceCriteria: Create migration for platform_admins table with: id (UUID PK), email (VARCHAR UNIQUE), password_hash (VARCHAR), created_at, updated_at
Platform admins are separate from tenant users

userStories.title: Add organization_id to users table
userStories.description: As a developer, I need users scoped to organizations for multi-tenancy.
acceptanceCriteria: Create migration adding organization_id column to users table (UUID, NOT NULL after backfill)
Add foreign key constraint to organizations
Add index on organization_id for filtered queries

userStories.title: Add organization_id to services table
userStories.description: As a developer, I need services scoped to organizations.
acceptanceCriteria: Create migration adding organization_id column to services table
Add foreign key constraint to organizations

userStories.title: Add organization_id to remaining tables
userStories.description: As a developer, I need all business tables scoped to organizations.
acceptanceCriteria: Add organization_id to: locations, bookings, payments, blocks, working_hours
Add foreign key constraints to organizations table

userStories.title: Create Organization model and repository
userStories.description: As a developer, I need Rust structs and CRUD operations for organizations.
acceptanceCriteria: Create OrganizationSettings struct with branding fields
Create organization_repo.rs with: create, find_by_id, find_by_slug, update, list

userStories.title: Create TenantDatabase model and repository
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to manage tenant database records.
acceptanceCriteria: Create tenant_database_repo.rs with: create, find_by_org_id, update_status

userStories.title: Create PlatformAdmin model and repository
userStories.description: As a developer, I need platform admin CRUD operations.
acceptanceCriteria: Create platform_admin_repo.rs with: create, find_by_email, verify_password
Use Argon2 for password hashing (same as existing users)

userStories.title: Implement tenant connection pool manager
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to route database queries to the correct tenant database.
acceptanceCriteria: Implement get_pool(org_id) that returns the correct connection pool
Cache connection pools in a HashMap<OrganizationId, PgPool>
Implement lazy connection pool creation on first access

userStories.title: Add org_id to JWT claims
userStories.description: As a developer, I need JWTs to include the organization context.
acceptanceCriteria: Update Claims struct in crates/api/src/auth.rs to include org_id field
Update create_token to accept org_id parameter
Update token validation to extract org_id

userStories.title: Create TenantContext extractor
userStories.description: As a developer, I need an Axum extractor that provides tenant context to handlers.
acceptanceCriteria: Create TenantContext struct with org_id and pool fields
Return 401 if org_id missing or invalid

userStories.title: Update user repository for multi-tenancy
userStories.description: As a developer, I need user queries to filter by organization.
acceptanceCriteria: Update UserRepository to accept TenantContext or org_id parameter
All user queries include WHERE organization_id = $org_id

userStories.title: Update service repository for multi-tenancy
userStories.description: As a developer, I need service queries scoped to organization.
acceptanceCriteria: Update ServiceRepository methods to filter by organization_id
list returns only current tenant's services

userStories.title: Update remaining repositories for multi-tenancy
userStories.description: As a developer, I need all repositories scoped to organization.

userStories.title: Update auth routes for multi-tenancy
userStories.description: As a developer, I need login/register to work with tenant context.
acceptanceCriteria: Update register endpoint to accept org_slug in request or derive from subdomain
Update login to include org_id in JWT
Login validates user belongs to organization

userStories.title: Update service routes for multi-tenancy
userStories.description: As a developer, I need service endpoints to use tenant context.
acceptanceCriteria: Update GET /services to use TenantContext extractor
Update GET /services/:id to verify service belongs to tenant

userStories.title: Update booking routes for multi-tenancy
userStories.description: As a developer, I need booking endpoints scoped to tenant.
acceptanceCriteria: Update GET /bookings/:id to verify booking belongs to tenant
Update confirm/cancel endpoints for tenant scope

userStories.title: Update remaining routes for multi-tenancy
userStories.description: As a developer, I need all endpoints tenant-aware.
acceptanceCriteria: Update location routes for tenant context
Update availability routes for tenant context
Update block routes for tenant context

userStories.title: Create platform admin auth endpoints
userStories.description: As a platform admin, I need separate login from tenant users.
acceptanceCriteria: Return JWT with platform_admin claim (no org_id)
Create PlatformAdminAuth extractor for protected routes

userStories.title: Create POST /admin/tenants endpoint
userStories.description: As a platform admin, I need to create new tenants.

userStories.title: Create GET /admin/tenants endpoint
userStories.description: As a platform admin, I need to list all tenants.
acceptanceCriteria: Return list of all organizations with settings

userStories.title: Create GET/PATCH /admin/tenants/:id endpoints
userStories.description: As a platform admin, I need to view and update tenant details.
acceptanceCriteria: PATCH supports updating: name, subscription_tier, custom_domain

userStories.title: Create DELETE /admin/tenants/:id endpoint
userStories.description: As a platform admin, I need to deactivate tenants.
acceptanceCriteria: Soft-delete: set status to 'inactive', don't destroy data

userStories.title: Create public branding endpoint
userStories.description: As a customer, I need to fetch tenant branding without authentication.
acceptanceCriteria: Determine tenant from Host header (subdomain or custom domain)
Return branding config: company_name, logo_url, primary_color, secondary_color, accent_color, support_email

userStories.title: Create tenant branding management endpoints
userStories.description: As a tenant admin, I need to update my branding.
acceptanceCriteria: Validate hex color codes (must match #XXXXXX pattern)

userStories.title: Implement subdomain tenant lookup
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to resolve tenant from subdomain.
acceptanceCriteria: Parse subdomain from Host header (e.g., acme.dogwalker.app -> acme)

userStories.title: Implement custom domain tenant lookup
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to resolve tenant from custom domain.
acceptanceCriteria: Extend extract_tenant_from_host to check custom_domain field
If Host doesn't match platform domain, lookup by custom_domain
Custom domain takes precedence over subdomain

userStories.title: Set up Admin Dashboard React project
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the frontend project structure for admin dashboard.
acceptanceCriteria: Initialize with: npm create vite@latest . -- --template react-ts
Verify in browser: shows Vite default page

userStories.title: Create Admin Dashboard API client
userStories.description: As a developer, I need an API client for making authenticated requests.
acceptanceCriteria: Add Authorization header to requests automatically
Handle 401 responses by redirecting to login
Export typed API methods: get, post, put, delete

userStories.title: Create Admin Dashboard routing structure
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the app routing configured.
acceptanceCriteria: Set up React Router in src/App.tsx
Create placeholder page components for each route
Add protected route wrapper that redirects to /login if not authenticated
Verify in browser: navigation between routes works

userStories.title: Build Admin Dashboard login page
userStories.description: As a tenant admin, I need to log in to the dashboard.
acceptanceCriteria: Verify in browser: can log in with valid credentials

userStories.title: Build Admin Dashboard layout shell
userStories.description: As a tenant admin, I need a consistent navigation layout.
acceptanceCriteria: Add sidebar with navigation links to all main sections
Add header with company name and logout button
Logout clears token and redirects to login
Verify in browser: sidebar visible, logout works

userStories.title: Build Admin Dashboard home/overview page
userStories.description: As a tenant admin, I need to see key metrics on the dashboard.
acceptanceCriteria: Display: today's booking count, this week's revenue, pending bookings count
Fetch data from API (create endpoints if needed)
Verify in browser: metrics display correctly

userStories.title: Build walker list page
userStories.description: As a tenant admin, I need to see all my walkers.
acceptanceCriteria: Display table with: name, email, phone, status (active/inactive)
Verify in browser: walker list displays

userStories.title: Build add walker form
userStories.description: As a tenant admin, I need to add new walkers to my team.
acceptanceCriteria: Add 'Add Walker' button to Walkers page
Create modal or drawer with form: first_name, last_name, email, phone
Close modal and refresh list on success
Verify in browser: can add new walker

userStories.title: Build service list page
userStories.description: As a tenant admin, I need to see and manage my services.
acceptanceCriteria: Display table with: name, duration, price, status
Verify in browser: service list displays

userStories.title: Build add/edit service form
userStories.description: As a tenant admin, I need to create and edit services.
acceptanceCriteria: Add 'Add Service' button to Services page
Create modal with form: name, description, duration_minutes, base_price_cents, is_active
Support both create (POST) and edit (PATCH) modes
Close modal and refresh list on success
Verify in browser: can add and edit services

userStories.title: Build booking list page
userStories.description: As a tenant admin, I need to see all bookings.
acceptanceCriteria: Create GET /bookings endpoint that returns all tenant bookings (admin only)
Display table with: date, time, customer, walker, service, status
Add status filter dropdown (all, pending, confirmed, completed, cancelled)
Verify in browser: booking list displays with filter

userStories.title: Build booking detail view
userStories.description: As a tenant admin, I need to view and manage individual bookings.
acceptanceCriteria: Add click handler to booking rows that opens detail modal
Show full booking details: customer info, walker, service, location, times, price, notes
Add action buttons: Confirm (if pending), Cancel, Mark Complete
Call appropriate API endpoints on action
Verify in browser: can view and update booking status

userStories.title: Build customer list page
userStories.description: As a tenant admin, I need to see all my customers.
acceptanceCriteria: Display table with: name, email, phone, booking count
Add search input that filters by name/email
Verify in browser: customer list displays with search

userStories.title: Build branding settings page
userStories.description: As a tenant admin, I need to customize my business branding.
acceptanceCriteria: Form fields: company_name, primary_color, secondary_color, accent_color, support_email, support_phone
Use color picker inputs for color fields
Verify in browser: can update and save branding

userStories.title: Set up Customer Web React project
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the frontend project for customer booking.
acceptanceCriteria: Verify in browser: shows default page

userStories.title: Implement dynamic theming for Customer Web
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the customer UI to apply tenant branding dynamically.
acceptanceCriteria: Fetch branding from GET /api/branding on app load
Create CSS variables from branding colors (--color-primary, etc.)
Apply CSS variables to document root
Verify in browser: colors apply from API response

userStories.title: Build Customer Web registration page
userStories.description: As a customer, I need to create an account.
acceptanceCriteria: Form fields: first_name, last_name, email, phone, password, confirm_password
Store JWT and redirect to home on success
Verify in browser: can register new account

userStories.title: Build Customer Web login page
userStories.description: As a customer, I need to log in to book services.
acceptanceCriteria: Store JWT and redirect to home on success
Verify in browser: can log in

userStories.title: Build Customer Web service listing
userStories.description: As a customer, I need to browse available services.
acceptanceCriteria: Create src/pages/Services.tsx as home page for logged-in users
Display service cards with: name, description, duration, price
Style cards with tenant branding colors
Click card to start booking flow
Verify in browser: service cards display

userStories.title: Build Customer Web location management
userStories.description: As a customer, I need to save my locations for booking.
acceptanceCriteria: Add location form with: name, address, city, state, zip, notes
Verify in browser: can add/edit/delete locations

userStories.title: Build Customer Web date/time selection
userStories.description: As a customer, I need to pick a date and time for my booking.
acceptanceCriteria: Display available time slots for selected date
Select slot to proceed to confirmation
Show message if no slots available
Verify in browser: can select date and time slot

userStories.title: Build Customer Web booking confirmation
userStories.description: As a customer, I need to review and confirm my booking.
acceptanceCriteria: Display summary: service, date, time, location, price
Confirm button creates booking via POST /bookings
Show success page with booking details
Verify in browser: can complete booking

userStories.title: Build Customer Web booking history
userStories.description: As a customer, I need to view my bookings.
acceptanceCriteria: Show booking details: service, date, time, status
Add cancel button for pending/confirmed bookings
Verify in browser: can view and cancel bookings

userStories.title: Set up iOS Xcode project
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the iOS project structure.
acceptanceCriteria: Create Xcode project with SwiftUI App template
Set minimum deployment target to iOS 16.0
Create folder structure: Views, Models, Services, Utilities

userStories.title: Create iOS API client
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a network layer for API calls.
acceptanceCriteria: Implement generic request method with async/await
Support GET, POST, PUT, DELETE methods
Add token to Authorization header automatically

userStories.title: Create iOS branding service
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to fetch and cache tenant branding.
acceptanceCriteria: Create BrandingConfig model with colors, logo_url, company_name
Cache branding in UserDefaults for offline access

userStories.title: Create iOS dynamic theming
userStories.description: As a developer, I need UI components to use tenant colors.
acceptanceCriteria: Convert hex strings to SwiftUI Color
Expose primary, secondary, accent colors from branding

userStories.title: Build iOS login screen
userStories.description: As a customer, I need to log in via the iOS app.
acceptanceCriteria: Store token in Keychain on success
Verify on simulator: can log in

userStories.title: Build iOS registration screen
userStories.description: As a customer, I need to create an account via iOS app.
acceptanceCriteria: Form fields: first name, last name, email, phone, password

userStories.title: Build iOS service list
userStories.description: As a customer, I need to browse services in the app.
acceptanceCriteria: Display as List with service name, duration, price

userStories.title: Build iOS location selection
userStories.description: As a customer, I need to select a location for my booking.
acceptanceCriteria: Add new location button (links to add form)
Select location to continue booking flow
Verify on simulator: can select location

userStories.title: Build iOS add location form
userStories.description: As a customer, I need to add new locations in the app.
acceptanceCriteria: Form fields: name, address, city, state, zip, notes
Dismiss and refresh list on success
Verify on simulator: can add location

userStories.title: Build iOS date picker
userStories.description: As a customer, I need to select a date for my booking.
acceptanceCriteria: Show next 14 days as selectable list or calendar
Select date to fetch time slots
Verify on simulator: can select date

userStories.title: Build iOS time slot selection
userStories.description: As a customer, I need to pick an available time slot.
acceptanceCriteria: Show slot start time and duration
Select slot to proceed to confirmation
Show empty state if no slots
Verify on simulator: can select time slot

userStories.title: Build iOS booking confirmation
userStories.description: As a customer, I need to confirm my booking in the app.
acceptanceCriteria: Display summary: service, date, time, location, price
Show success view with booking details
Verify on simulator: can complete booking

userStories.title: Build iOS bookings list
userStories.description: As a customer, I need to view my bookings in the app.
acceptanceCriteria: Show booking cards with service, date, time, status

userStories.title: Build iOS booking detail and cancellation
userStories.description: As a customer, I need to view details and cancel bookings.
acceptanceCriteria: Verify on simulator: can view and cancel

userStories.title: Implement iOS biometric authentication
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to use Face ID/Touch ID to log in.
acceptanceCriteria: Store flag in UserDefaults if user enabled biometrics
On app launch, prompt biometric if token exists and biometrics enabled
Fall back to password if biometric fails
Verify on simulator: biometric prompt appears

userStories.title: Implement iOS push notification registration
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to receive push notifications.
acceptanceCriteria: Request notification permission on first login
Send device token to backend via POST /users/device-token
Create backend endpoint to store device tokens

userStories.title: Create platform admin web dashboard project
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a separate dashboard for platform admins.
acceptanceCriteria: Verify in browser: shows default page

userStories.title: Build platform admin login
userStories.description: As a platform admin, I need to log in to manage tenants.
acceptanceCriteria: Redirect to tenant list on success
Different styling from tenant admin dashboard
Verify in browser: can log in as platform admin

userStories.title: Build platform admin tenant list
userStories.description: As a platform admin, I need to see all tenants.
acceptanceCriteria: Display table: name, slug, subscription tier, status, created date
Verify in browser: tenant list displays

userStories.title: Build platform admin create tenant form
userStories.description: As a platform admin, I need to create new tenants.
acceptanceCriteria: Fields: name, slug, admin_email, admin_password, subscription_tier
Validate slug is lowercase alphanumeric with hyphens
Verify in browser: can create tenant

userStories.title: Build platform admin tenant detail page
userStories.description: As a platform admin, I need to view and edit tenant details.
acceptanceCriteria: Show: name, slug, domains, subscription tier, branding preview
Verify in browser: can view and edit tenant

userStories.title: Add Stripe dependency and config
userStories.description: As a developer, I need Stripe SDK configured for billing.

userStories.title: Create Stripe customer on tenant creation
userStories.description: As a platform admin, I need tenants linked to Stripe customers.
acceptanceCriteria: Use tenant admin email as Stripe customer email

userStories.title: Create subscription plans in Stripe
userStories.description: As a developer, I need subscription products configured.
acceptanceCriteria: Document Stripe product/price IDs to create manually in Stripe dashboard
Store price IDs in environment variables

userStories.title: Create subscription checkout endpoint
userStories.description: As a tenant admin, I need to subscribe to a plan.

userStories.title: Handle Stripe webhooks
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to process subscription events.

userStories.title: Build tenant billing page
userStories.description: As a tenant admin, I need to manage my subscription.
acceptanceCriteria: Create billing tab in admin dashboard settings
Create POST /admin/billing/portal endpoint returning Stripe portal URL
Add 'Manage Billing' button linking to Stripe portal
Verify in browser: can access billing management

userStories.title: Add usage tracking tables
userStories.description: As a platform admin, I need to track tenant usage.
acceptanceCriteria: Create migration for tenant_usage table: org_id, month, booking_count, customer_count, api_calls

userStories.title: Implement usage tracking middleware
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to count API calls per tenant.
acceptanceCriteria: Create Axum middleware that increments api_calls counter
Batch updates (don't hit DB on every request)

userStories.title: Track booking and customer counts
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to track booking and customer metrics.
acceptanceCriteria: Increment customer_count on new customer registration
Update tenant_usage table for current month

userStories.title: Add usage metrics to platform admin dashboard
userStories.description: As a platform admin, I need to see tenant usage.
acceptanceCriteria: Display usage chart on tenant detail page
Verify in browser: usage metrics display
